assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that there is no conflict of interest. ARS or CVVH is or was full-time employees of the Regeneron Genetics Center from Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Inc. and receive or received stock options and restricted stock units as compensation.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: These participants had provided written consent for DNA sequencing; and informed consent was obtained from all subjects. The consent was approved by the Institutional Review Board of the NIDDK and/or by the Phoenix Area Indian Health Service Institutional Review Board.

funder.name: Intramural Research Programme of National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases, National Institutes of Health.
